mapper.select: select member_id,member_pass from members where member_id=#{member_id} and member_pass=#{member_pass}
select * from members where del_yn='n' and member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.insert: insert into members(member_id, member_pass, member_email, member_nick) values(#{member_id},#{member_pass},#{member_email}, #{member_nick})
mapper.update: update set members member_pass,member_phone,member_email where member_id=#{member_id}, member_phone=#{member_phone},member_pass=#{member_pass}
mapper.delete: delete * from members where member_id=#{member_id} and member_pass=#{member_pass}
